newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-Intuit started as neutral.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Intuit started as neutral.

text.p: Piper Jaffray said it started coverage of Intuit Inc with a neutral rating.
-- In research note, analyst Bill Burnham said, "Intuit's aggressive move on to the Internet shows long-term promise and vision but short-term revenue growth may lag in the interim."
-- Estimates earnings at $0.79 per share in fiscal 1997 and $0.94 in 1998.
-- Set target price at $28.50 per share.
